W) Absolute hardness increases linearly with increasing Moh's hardness X) Fluorite has a higher Moh's hardness number than calcite Y) Topaz is harder than corundum Z) Gypsum is the softest known mineral
answer:
X) FLUORITE HAS A HIGHER MOH'S HARDNESS NUMBER THAN CALCITE
******************
